html:
3.5.18  2:25 am   what's a good name for a nuclear bomb

     bomby

3.5.18  2:17 am   did you study history in school?

     no

3.5.18  1:18 am   Do you like any modern poetry?

     sure

      If so, which?

     those warnings that tell you you have already consented to something you didn't know about

3.5.18  1:16 am   help i don't know how to try things in a different way!

     try doing it at a different time?

3.5.18  1:15 am   in la de da what was the meaning of the too small for the mall verse?

     the first 3 lines felt good, and came to me immediately, as soon as i started thinking about a second verse. the 4th line was slightly more stubborn, and my first guess was 'just too tall' but i didn't like that so i just switched it to 'just too small' which i don't really like either. but the exrtra background echo makes it seem like i liked it

3.5.18  1:14 am   WHY DO YOU WRITE IN lowercase?

     i think most people write in mostly lowercase. it seems reasonable and i think most people are used to it

3.5.18  1:12 am   Is truth subjective?

     i'm not sure but i think the idea of truth being subjective is very subjective

3.5.18  12:46 am   i'd played piano since childhood but then stopped doing. i find the reason it kind of bored me is that my teacher only trained me how to play the notes, like doing finger gymnastics. never have i ever learned how to listen to the music. any advice? it seems really foreign to me

     your teacher forgot to tell you to listen to how the notes sound. that's the secret to the whole thing. that's actually how the listeners hear the music

3.5.18  12:30 am   I need a new catchphrase

     how about phrase-catch

3.5.18  12:06 am   Is it safe to say that you "love" making your content? Which is to say that even in if you might not like it in the moment, overall, you still love to do it?

     it's nice

3.4.18  11:50 pm   I have ten minutes left for my birthday. What should I do?

     try to see how old you can get, just in those 10 minutes

3.4.18  10:50 pm   Why do you write in lowercase

     you just asked that question using at least 95% lower case letters. perhaps you could take a cold hard look in the mirror and ask yourself why you use them

3.4.18  10:34 pm   can you into space?

     i will try

3.4.18  9:47 pm   Why do most of your videos fade to black at the end?

     i wouldn't really call that a fade, most of them go to black almost instantaneously. almost every video i've ever seen, anywhere, has a little bit of black at the end. that's just to make sure all the content gets seen even if it's played on a player that cuts off the ending a tiny bit

3.4.18  9:01 pm   do you ever use capital letters 

     yes, do you

3.4.18  8:54 pm   HALP! I HAVE A CIRCLE OF FITHTS QUIZ TOMMROW. WE ARE DOING THE FLATS.. I KNOW THE ORDER PF THE LETTERS BUT I THE PLACE,ENT OF NOTES ON THE STAFF? IS THERE ANY TRICK TO MEMORIZE IT?

     on treble clef the middle line is B, and on bass clef the middle line is D. the letters go up with the lines and spaces. every line or space is a letter. key signatures never go off the staff, they zig zag neatly up and down. when doing the sharps there is one where it goes down a 4th twice just to stay within the boundary of the staff. just keep it on the staff, and don't put them on ledger lines

3.4.18  8:12 pm   oh and ur 3d animation is fun to watch. do you think it will be in the next video?

     yes

3.4.18  7:54 pm   why do so many songs talk about love?

     because it is meaningful, and good

3.4.18  7:24 pm   how do i write a song

     you're going to have to make up a way

3.4.18  6:41 pm   You state you can't go home "because I'm not welcome".

     i didn't state that, those are lyrics to a song i wrote

      Is that because your home is the mall and you're too small for it?

3.4.18  6:34 pm   have you ever made a song with whistling?

     no

      if so, can we please get a link?

3.4.18  5:48 pm   will i ever see that one bird-thing that hands steve a letter when he's in the mountains again?

     that depends whether you watch the "hi, i'm steve" video again

      he's an interesting fellow, though he doesn't talk much

     it is only in the video for about 1 and a half seconds, and it is talking the entire time. also why do you think it is a 'he'

3.4.18  5:15 pm   Are you a movie star yet?

     i will check

3.4.18  5:12 pm   why do you have a website

     so you could go to it

3.4.18  4:17 pm   can we tame art?

     you can tame some of it, but there can always be more, untamed

3.4.18  3:59 pm   when you go to Vidcon will you try to pick up your Shorty award?

     those are on opposite sides of the country but maybe

3.4.18  3:15 pm   if people who have rabies are rabid then are people who have babies babid

     no

3.4.18  2:31 pm   do you have a little imaginary man in your mind saying "today is your day go get it"

     not exactly

3.4.18  1:59 pm   3.4.18  2:43 am but will you specifically use the tambourine that you saved for later in 2014

     absolutely not

3.4.18  1:51 pm   have you ever wrote a song by writing down words and then singing those words in the first melody that comes to your head, essentially making it up as you go

     most lyrics would automatically have the first melody i thought of for those words, because i do the lyrics and melody simutaneously. if it doesn't work, i would usually just imagine entirely different lyrics+melody, simultaneously

3.4.18  1:48 pm   3.4.18  2:43 am BUT ITS WRAPPED IN TINFOIL

     not the one in the songs

3.4.18  1:39 pm   Do you like using a common note for your melodies?

     all notes are common

3.4.18  1:37 pm   are you afraid of over compression 

     not really

3.4.18  1:35 pm   have you ever scrapped an idea because you know that millions of people will watch it

     i think so

3.4.18  1:17 pm   Is the universe infinite?

     i don't see why not

3.4.18  12:11 pm   How did your last session on the current project do?

     good

3.4.18  9:31 am   Hi Bill. I'm crazy it's raining is my favorite song. I hope it can be on Spotify soon. What makes you choose certain songs to be available for streaming?

     every new song i release goes there

3.4.18  8:49 am   Why everyone hates me?

     maybe someone hates them

3.4.18  7:17 am   Have you watched every bill wurtz video ever?

     yes

3.4.18  5:19 am   What's your adress?

     4

3.4.18  5:18 am   Your last few videos have us viewers concerned about your mental health. You can get through this.

     it takes a lot of focus and very organized hard work to do videos like that. i don't think it would be possible to pull that off without good mental health. you may be forgetting that the videos are written very specifically ahead of time, and then executed very carefully according to the script

3.4.18  4:56 am   so I don't get how some people can be a tits-man but not an ass-man

     women can have them too

3.4.18  4:41 am   How do you feel about people reuploading your video on youtube but they edited it? (e.g. HOTEWIG but every after jingle, it gets faster, etc.)

     a little more financially secure

3.4.18  2:54 am   Are you think sometimes question in this page like you are a theraphist?

     sure

3.4.18  2:53 am   Is there sentimental value that you have for Africa?

     yes

3.4.18  2:43 am   will you use the tambourine ever again??? I want to hear it again

     i use tambourine in almost every song i produce. i never stopped using it

3.4.18  2:33 am   why do you post your works online? why do you want to show your work to us?

     because i think some people might like it

3.4.18  2:32 am   why do you capitalize love in your videos

     sometimes i capitalize things for emphasis. also, L is sometimes a special case, and more likely to be capitalized, because the lowercase L sometimes does not look enough like L

3.4.18  2:28 am   Why did you write la de da de day oh

     because it seemed to fit well right after the verse and pre-chorus i already had ('i wanna write a song' etc)

3.4.18  1:46 am   What aren't you doing right now?

     hate crimes
